short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MakerWorld Plus adds extra features to your MakerWorld browsing experience!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your MakerWorld browsing experience with advanced comment filters, a total downloads counter, statistic button, and more quality of life improvements. This extension was initially made just for me but I decided to release a public build for everyone to download. More features might get added in the future!

Current list of features:

- Total downloads counter on model and profile pages
- Dynamic progress bar on profile pages indicating progress to next reward
- View item statistics button that links directly to detailed statistics of your model
- Advanced comment filters like filter for pictures, rating, author reply, and boosts
- Quick reply options
- Option to manually blur used gift cards

This extension has only been tested on the MakerWorld.com/en/ website and currently does not support local variants of the website. In the future I might add support for local websites. I think I got all the bugs out but don't be surprised if you come across one. Just let me know and I will see if I can get it fixed! :)

This extension is a personal project and is not affiliated with Bambulabs! If Bambulabs updates Makerworld it can make the extension not function properly. Since I am a solo developer and mantain this extension for fun it can take me a while to update.
